When he wakes up, he realizes he's the only one left on the island, but he's in a bad shape. With only a few pieces of driftwood, he builds a raft and heads out to sea, but he's not very skilled in water. After a dangerous journey, he finally returns home, but his parents are not very excited to see him back.
